\begin{objectivesBox}{iconmonstr-target-4-240.png}
So far, you have learnt to ask a RQ, design a study, collect the data, describe the data, and graphically summarise data.
\textbf{In this chapter}, you will learn to numerically describe \emph{qualitative} data.
Both quantitative and qualitative \emph{data} are described numerically in \emph{quantitative research}.
You will learn to:

\begin{itemize}\tightlist
  \item
  present and numerically summarise qualitative data.
  \item
  compute and understand row and column proportions (and percentages).
  \item
  compute and understand odds and odds ratios.
  \item
  describe relationships between qualitative variables.
\end{itemize}
\end{objectivesBox}

\end{col}
